name: Households using solid fuels for cooking (Urban vs. Rural) - UN
title: Households using solid fuels for cooking (Urban vs. Rural) - UN
description: Data presents the percentage of households using solid fuels (wood, crop residues, dung, charcoal, and coal) for cooking by region. This data has been aggregated by urban vs. rural households.

sources.name: Households using solid fuels for cooking (Urban vs. Rural) - UN
sources.dataPublishedBy: United Nations Publications (2010). The World's Women 2010: Trends and Statistics.
sources.additionalInfo: Data presents the percentage of households using solid fuels (wood, crop residues, dung, charcoal, and coal) for cooking by region. This data has been aggregated by urban vs. rural households.
